name: IISA Corps
uniques: Only available <in cities with a [Internal Isnisian Security Administration]>

civilopediaText.text: The Isnisian empire's feared police force, few in number yet extremely powerful on the battlefield. This unit's mere presence puts fear deep into the hearts of those bearing the misfortune of encountering it on the frontline.

The InLA-40 is the empire's powerful heavy tank. It boldly drives into battle with its shiny steel hull, almost impenetrable. Its prowess on the battlefield almost unmatched for 40 years before finally being outperformed by modern technology. Yet it still saw some use in modern campaigns.
